Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 11 And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.

Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 12 Therefore rejoice, ye heavens, and ye that dwell in them. Woe to the inhabiters of the earth and of the sea! for the devil is come down unto you, having great wrath, because he knoweth that he hath but a short time.

Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 13 And when the dragon saw that he was cast unto the earth, he persecuted the woman which brought forth the man child.

Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 14 And to the woman were given two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness, into her place, where she is nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.

Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 15 And the serpent cast out of his mouth water as a flood after the woman, that he might cause her to be carried away of the flood.

Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 16 And the earth helped the woman, and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the flood which the dragon cast out of his mouth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 12:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went to make war with the remnant of her seed, which keep the commandments of God, and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 1 And I stood upon the sand of the sea, and saw a beast rise up out of the sea, having seven heads and ten horns, and upon his horns ten crowns, and upon his heads the name of blasphemy.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 2 And the beast which I saw was like unto a leopard, and his feet were as the feet of a bear, and his mouth as the mouth of a lion: and the dragon gave him his power, and his seat, and great authority.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 3 And I saw one of his heads as it were wounded to death; and his deadly wound was healed: and all the world wondered after the beast.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 4 And they worshipped the dragon which gave power unto the beast: and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who is like unto the beast? who is able to make war with him?

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 5 And there was given unto him a mouth speaking great things and blasphemies; and power was given unto him to continue forty and two months.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 6 And he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his tabernacle, and them that dwell in heaven.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 7 And it was given unto him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them: and power was given him over all kindreds, and tongues, and nations.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 8 And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 9 If any man have an ear, let him hear.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 10 He that leadeth into captivity shall go into captivity: he that killeth with the sword must be killed with the sword. Here is the patience and the faith of the saints.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 11 And I beheld another beast coming up out of the earth; and he had two horns like a lamb, and he spake as a dragon.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 12 And he exerciseth all the power of the first beast before him, and causeth the earth and them which dwell therein to worship the first beast, whose deadly wound was healed.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 13 And he doeth great wonders, so that he maketh fire come down from heaven on the earth in the sight of men,

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 14 And deceiveth them that dwell on the earth by the means of those miracles which he had power to do in the sight of the beast; saying to them that dwell on the earth, that they should make an image to the beast, which had the wound by a sword, and did live.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 15 And he had power to give life unto the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause that as many as would not worship the image of the beast should be killed.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 16 And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads:

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 17 And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name.

Bible.Title: Revelation 13:
Bible.Verse: 18 Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast: for it is the number of a man; and his number is Six hundred threescore and six.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 1 And I looked, and, lo, a Lamb stood on the mount Sion, and with him an hundred forty and four thousand, having his Father's name written in their foreheads.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 2 And I heard a voice from heaven, as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of a great thunder: and I heard the voice of harpers harping with their harps:

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 3 And they sung as it were a new song before the throne, and before the four beasts, and the elders: and no man could learn that song but the hundred and forty and four thousand, which were redeemed from the earth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 4 These are they which were not defiled with women; for they are virgins. These are they which follow the Lamb whithersoever he goeth. These were redeemed from among men, being the firstfruits unto God and to the Lamb.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 5 And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 6 And I saw another angel fly in the midst of heaven, having the everlasting gospel to preach unto them that dwell on the earth, and to every nation, and kindred, and tongue, and people,

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 7 Saying with a loud voice, Fear God, and give glory to him; for the hour of his judgment is come: and worship him that made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and the fountains of waters.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 8 And there followed another angel, saying, Babylon is fallen, is fallen, that great city, because she made all nations drink of the wine of the wrath of her fornication.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 9 And the third angel followed them, saying with a loud voice, If any man worship the beast and his image, and receive his mark in his forehead, or in his hand,

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 10 The same shall drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is poured out without mixture into the cup of his indignation; and he shall be tormented with fire and brimstone in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb:

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 11 And the smoke of their torment ascendeth up for ever and ever: and they have no rest day nor night, who worship the beast and his image, and whosoever receiveth the mark of his name.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 12 Here is the patience of the saints: here are they that keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 13 And I heard a voice from heaven saying unto me, Write, Blessed are the dead which die in the Lord from henceforth: Yea, saith the Spirit, that they may rest from their labours; and their works do follow them.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 14 And I looked, and behold a white cloud, and upon the cloud one sat like unto the Son of man, having on his head a golden crown, and in his hand a sharp sickle.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 15 And another angel came out of the temple, crying with a loud voice to him that sat on the cloud, Thrust in thy sickle, and reap: for the time is come for thee to reap; for the harvest of the earth is ripe.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 16 And he that sat on the cloud thrust in his sickle on the earth; and the earth was reaped.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 17 And another angel came out of the temple which is in heaven, he also having a sharp sickle.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 18 And another angel came out from the altar, which had power over fire; and cried with a loud cry to him that had the sharp sickle, saying, Thrust in thy sharp sickle, and gather the clusters of the vine of the earth; for her grapes are fully ripe.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 19 And the angel thrust in his sickle into the earth, and gathered the vine of the earth, and cast it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 14:
Bible.Verse: 20 And the winepress was trodden without the city, and blood came out of the winepress, even unto the horse bridles, by the space of a thousand and six hundred furlongs.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 1 And I saw another sign in heaven, great and marvellous, seven angels having the seven last plagues; for in them is filled up the wrath of God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 2 And I saw as it were a sea of glass mingled with fire: and them that had gotten the victory over the beast, and over his image, and over his mark, and over the number of his name, stand on the sea of glass, having the harps of God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 3 And they sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 4 Who shall not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy: for all nations shall come and worship before thee; for thy judgments are made manifest.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 5 And after that I looked, and, behold, the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened:

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 6 And the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 7 And one of the four beasts gave unto the seven angels seven golden vials full of the wrath of God, who liveth for ever and ever.

Bible.Title: Revelation 15:
Bible.Verse: 8 And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no man was able to enter into the temple, till the seven plagues of the seven angels were fulfilled.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 1 And I heard a great voice out of the temple saying to the seven angels, Go your ways, and pour out the vials of the wrath of God upon the earth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 2 And the first went, and poured out his vial upon the earth; and there fell a noisome and grievous sore upon the men which had the mark of the beast, and upon them which worshipped his image.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 3 And the second angel poured out his vial upon the sea; and it became as the blood of a dead man: and every living soul died in the sea.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 4 And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters; and they became blood.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 5 And I heard the angel of the waters say, Thou art righteous, O Lord, which art, and wast, and shalt be, because thou hast judged thus.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 6 For they have shed the blood of saints and prophets, and thou hast given them blood to drink; for they are worthy.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 7 And I heard another out of the altar say, Even so, Lord God Almighty, true and righteous are thy judgments.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 8 And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 9 And men were scorched with great heat, and blasphemed the name of God, which hath power over these plagues: and they repented not to give him glory.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 10 And the fifth angel poured out his vial upon the seat of the beast; and his kingdom was full of darkness; and they gnawed their tongues for pain,

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 11 And blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores, and repented not of their deeds.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 12 And the sixth angel poured out his vial upon the great river Euphrates; and the water thereof was dried up, that the way of the kings of the east might be prepared.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 13 And I saw three unclean spirits like frogs come out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 14 For they are the spirits of devils, working miracles, which go forth unto the kings of the earth and of the whole world, to gather them to the battle of that great day of God Almighty.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 15 Behold, I come as a thief. Blessed is he that watcheth, and keepeth his garments, lest he walk naked, and they see his shame.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 16 And he gathered them together into a place called in the Hebrew tongue Armageddon.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the seventh angel poured out his vial into the air; and there came a great voice out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying, It is done.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 18 And there were voices, and thunders, and lightnings; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since men were upon the earth, so mighty an earthquake, and so great.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 19 And the great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell: and great Babylon came in remembrance before God, to give unto her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 20 And every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.

Bible.Title: Revelation 16:
Bible.Verse: 21 And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven, every stone about the weight of a talent: and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail; for the plague thereof was exceeding great.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 1 And there came one of the seven angels which had the seven vials, and talked with me, saying unto me, Come hither; I will shew unto thee the judgment of the great whore that sitteth upon many waters:

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 2 With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 3 So he carried me away in the spirit into the wilderness: and I saw a woman sit upon a scarlet coloured beast, full of names of blasphemy, having seven heads and ten horns.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 4 And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication:

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 5 And upon her forehead was a name written, MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 6 And I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus: and when I saw her, I wondered with great admiration.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 7 And the angel said unto me, Wherefore didst thou marvel? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carrieth her, which hath the seven heads and ten horns.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 8 The beast that thou sawest was, and is not; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit, and go into perdition: and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, when they behold the beast that was, and is not, and yet is.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 9 And here is the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 10 And there are seven kings: five are fallen, and one is, and the other is not yet come; and when he cometh, he must continue a short space.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 11 And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goeth into perdition.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 12 And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings, which have received no kingdom as yet; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 13 These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 14 These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 15 And he saith unto me, The waters which thou sawest, where the whore sitteth, are peoples, and multitudes, and nations, and tongues.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 16 And the ten horns which thou sawest upon the beast, these shall hate the whore, and shall make her desolate and naked, and shall eat her flesh, and burn her with fire.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 17 For God hath put in their hearts to fulfil his will, and to agree, and give their kingdom unto the beast, until the words of God shall be fulfilled.

Bible.Title: Revelation 17:
Bible.Verse: 18 And the woman which thou sawest is that great city, which reigneth over the kings of the earth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 1 And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great power; and the earth was lightened with his glory.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 2 And he cried mightily with a strong voice, saying, Babylon the great is fallen, is fallen, and is become the habitation of devils, and the hold of every foul spirit, and a cage of every unclean and hateful bird.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 3 For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication, and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her, and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich through the abundance of her delicacies.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 4 And I heard another voice from heaven, saying, Come out of her, my people, that ye be not partakers of her sins, and that ye receive not of her plagues.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 5 For her sins have reached unto heaven, and God hath remembered her iniquities.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 6 Reward her even as she rewarded you, and double unto her double according to her works: in the cup which she hath filled fill to her double.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 7 How much she hath glorified herself, and lived deliciously, so much torment and sorrow give her: for she saith in her heart, I sit a queen, and am no widow, and shall see no sorrow.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 8 Therefore shall her plagues come in one day, death, and mourning, and famine; and she shall be utterly burned with fire: for strong is the Lord God who judgeth her.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 9 And the kings of the earth, who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her, shall bewail her, and lament for her, when they shall see the smoke of her burning,

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 10 Standing afar off for the fear of her torment, saying, Alas, alas that great city Babylon, that mighty city! for in one hour is thy judgment come.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 11 And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more:

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 12 The merchandise of gold, and silver, and precious stones, and of pearls, and fine linen, and purple, and silk, and scarlet, and all thyine wood, and all manner vessels of ivory, and all manner vessels of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble,

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 13 And cinnamon, and odours, and ointments, and frankincense, and wine, and oil, and fine flour, and wheat, and beasts, and sheep, and horses, and chariots, and slaves, and souls of men.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 14 And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee, and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee, and thou shalt find them no more at all.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 15 The merchants of these things, which were made rich by her, shall stand afar off for the fear of her torment, weeping and wailing,

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 16 And saying, Alas, alas that great city, that was clothed in fine linen, and purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold, and precious stones, and pearls!

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 17 For in one hour so great riches is come to nought. And every shipmaster, and all the company in ships, and sailors, and as many as trade by sea, stood afar off,

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 18 And cried when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What city is like unto this great city!

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 19 And they cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and wailing, saying, Alas, alas that great city, wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness! for in one hour is she made desolate.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 20 Rejoice over her, thou heaven, and ye holy apostles and prophets; for God hath avenged you on her.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 21 And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone, and cast it into the sea, saying, Thus with violence shall that great city Babylon be thrown down, and shall be found no more at all.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 22 And the voice of harpers, and musicians, and of pipers, and trumpeters, shall be heard no more at all in thee; and no craftsman, of whatsoever craft he be, shall be found any more in thee; and the sound of a millstone shall be heard no more at all in thee;

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 23 And the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more at all in thee: for thy merchants were the great men of the earth; for by thy sorceries were all nations deceived.

Bible.Title: Revelation 18:
Bible.Verse: 24 And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints, and of all that were slain upon the earth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 1 And after these things I heard a great voice of much people in heaven, saying, Alleluia; Salvation, and glory, and honour, and power, unto the Lord our God:

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 2 For true and righteous are his judgments: for he hath judged the great whore, which did corrupt the earth with her fornication, and hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 3 And again they said, Alleluia And her smoke rose up for ever and ever.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 4 And the four and twenty elders and the four beasts fell down and worshipped God that sat on the throne, saying, Amen; Alleluia.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 5 And a voice came out of the throne, saying, Praise our God, all ye his servants, and ye that fear him, both small and great.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 6 And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 7 Let us be glad and rejoice, and give honour to him: for the marriage of the Lamb is come, and his wife hath made herself ready.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 8 And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 9 And he saith unto me, Write, Blessed are they which are called unto the marriage supper of the Lamb. And he saith unto me, These are the true sayings of God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 10 And I fell at his feet to worship him. And he said unto me, See thou do it not: I am thy fellowservant, and of thy brethren that have the testimony of Jesus: worship God: for the testimony of Jesus is the spirit of prophecy.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 11 And I saw heaven opened, and behold a white horse; and he that sat upon him was called Faithful and True, and in righteousness he doth judge and make war.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 12 His eyes were as a flame of fire, and on his head were many crowns; and he had a name written, that no man knew, but he himself.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 13 And he was clothed with a vesture dipped in blood: and his name is called The Word of God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 14 And the armies which were in heaven followed him upon white horses, clothed in fine linen, white and clean.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 15 And out of his mouth goeth a sharp sword, that with it he should smite the nations: and he shall rule them with a rod of iron: and he treadeth the winepress of the fierceness and wrath of Almighty God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 16 And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 17 And I saw an angel standing in the sun; and he cried with a loud voice, saying to all the fowls that fly in the midst of heaven, Come and gather yourselves together unto the supper of the great God;

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 18 That ye may eat the flesh of kings, and the flesh of captains, and the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses, and of them that sit on them, and the flesh of all men, both free and bond, both small and great.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 19 And I saw the beast, and the kings of the earth, and their armies, gathered together to make war against him that sat on the horse, and against his army.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 20 And the beast was taken, and with him the false prophet that wrought miracles before him, with which he deceived them that had received the mark of the beast, and them that worshipped his image. These both were cast alive into a lake of fire burning with brimstone.

Bible.Title: Revelation 19:
Bible.Verse: 21 And the remnant were slain with the sword of him that sat upon the horse, which sword proceeded out of his mouth: and all the fowls were filled with their flesh.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 1 And I saw an angel come down from heaven, having the key of the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 2 And he laid hold on the dragon, that old serpent, which is the Devil, and Satan, and bound him a thousand years,

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 3 And cast him into the bottomless pit, and shut him up, and set a seal upon him, that he should deceive the nations no more, till the thousand years should be fulfilled: and after that he must be loosed a little season.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 4 And I saw thrones, and they sat upon them, and judgment was given unto them: and I saw the souls of them that were beheaded for the witness of Jesus, and for the word of God, and which had not worshipped the beast, neither his image, neither had received his mark upon their foreheads, or in their hands; and they lived and reigned with Christ a thousand years.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 5 But the rest of the dead lived not again until the thousand years were finished. This is the first resurrection.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 6 Blessed and holy is he that hath part in the first resurrection: on such the second death hath no power, but they shall be priests of God and of Christ, and shall reign with him a thousand years.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 7 And when the thousand years are expired, Satan shall be loosed out of his prison,

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 8 And shall go out to deceive the nations which are in the four quarters of the earth, Gog, and Magog, to gather them together to battle: the number of whom is as the sand of the sea.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 9 And they went up on the breadth of the earth, and compassed the camp of the saints about, and the beloved city: and fire came down from God out of heaven, and devoured them.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 10 And the devil that deceived them was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone, where the beast and the false prophet are, and shall be tormented day and night for ever and ever.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 11 And I saw a great white throne, and him that sat on it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away; and there was found no place for them.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 12 And I saw the dead, small and great, stand before God; and the books were opened: and another book was opened, which is the book of life: and the dead were judged out of those things which were written in the books, according to their works.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 13 And the sea gave up the dead which were in it; and death and hell delivered up the dead which were in them: and they were judged every man according to their works.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 14 And death and hell were cast into the lake of fire. This is the second death.

Bible.Title: Revelation 20:
Bible.Verse: 15 And whosoever was not found written in the book of life was cast into the lake of fire.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 1 And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away; and there was no more sea.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 2 And I John saw the holy city, new Jerusalem, coming down from God out of heaven, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 3 And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 4 And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 5 And he that sat upon the throne said, Behold, I make all things new. And he said unto me, Write: for these words are true and faithful.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 6 And he said unto me, It is done. I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end. I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 7 He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 8 But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 9 And there came unto me one of the seven angels which had the seven vials full of the seven last plagues, and talked with me, saying, Come hither, I will shew thee the bride, the Lamb's wife.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 10 And he carried me away in the spirit to a great and high mountain, and shewed me that great city, the holy Jerusalem, descending out of heaven from God,

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 11 Having the glory of God: and her light was like unto a stone most precious, even like a jasper stone, clear as crystal;

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 12 And had a wall great and high, and had twelve gates, and at the gates twelve angels, and names written thereon, which are the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel:

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 13 On the east three gates; on the north three gates; on the south three gates; and on the west three gates.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 14 And the wall of the city had twelve foundations, and in them the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 15 And he that talked with me had a golden reed to measure the city, and the gates thereof, and the wall thereof.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 16 And the city lieth foursquare, and the length is as large as the breadth: and he measured the city with the reed, twelve thousand furlongs. The length and the breadth and the height of it are equal.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 17 And he measured the wall thereof, an hundred and forty and four cubits, according to the measure of a man, that is, of the angel.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 18 And the building of the wall of it was of jasper: and the city was pure gold, like unto clear glass.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 19 And the foundations of the wall of the city were garnished with all manner of precious stones. The first foundation was jasper; the second, sapphire; the third, a chalcedony; the fourth, an emerald;

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 20 The fifth, sardonyx; the sixth, sardius; the seventh, chrysolyte; the eighth, beryl; the ninth, a topaz; the tenth, a chrysoprasus; the eleventh, a jacinth; the twelfth, an amethyst.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 21 And the twelve gates were twelve pearls: every several gate was of one pearl: and the street of the city was pure gold, as it were transparent glass.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 22 And I saw no temple therein: for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple of it.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 23 And the city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 24 And the nations of them which are saved shall walk in the light of it: and the kings of the earth do bring their glory and honour into it.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 25 And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 26 And they shall bring the glory and honour of the nations into it.

Bible.Title: Revelation 21:
Bible.Verse: 27 And there shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth, neither whatsoever worketh abomination, or maketh a lie: but they which are written in the Lamb's book of life.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 1 And he shewed me a pure river of water of life, clear as crystal, proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 2 In the midst of the street of it, and on either side of the river, was there the tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 3 And there shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him:

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 4 And they shall see his face; and his name shall be in their foreheads.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 5 And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 6 And he said unto me, These sayings are faithful and true: and the Lord God of the holy prophets sent his angel to shew unto his servants the things which must shortly be done.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 7 Behold, I come quickly: blessed is he that keepeth the sayings of the prophecy of this book.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 8 And I John saw these things, and heard them. And when I had heard and seen, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel which shewed me these things.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 9 Then saith he unto me, See thou do it not: for I am thy fellowservant, and of thy brethren the prophets, and of them which keep the sayings of this book: worship God.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 10 And he saith unto me, Seal not the sayings of the prophecy of this book: for the time is at hand.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 11 He that is unjust, let him be unjust still: and he which is filthy, let him be filthy still: and he that is righteous, let him be righteous still: and he that is holy, let him be holy still.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 12 And, behold, I come quickly; and my reward is with me, to give every man according as his work shall be.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 13 I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 14 Blessed are they that do his commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and may enter in through the gates into the city.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 15 For without are dogs, and sorcerers, and whoremongers, and murderers, and idolaters, and whosoever loveth and maketh a lie.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 16 I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 18 For I testify unto every man that heareth the words of the prophecy of this book, If any man shall add unto these things, God shall add unto him the plagues that are written in this book:

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 19 And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from the things which are written in this book.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 20 He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

Bible.Title: Revelation 22:
Bible.Verse: 21 The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
